FileHandling

Class WriteToKML

  • java.lang.Object
    • FileHandling.WriteToKML

  • public final class WriteToKML
extends java.lang.Object
    Static class used for building a KML from a GameObjects project or layer (FOLDER OR FILE). NOTE: FILE OUTPUT IS IN THE MAIN DIRECTORY OF THE PROJECT. KML file is an XML file, therefore using javax.xml library we can build feed it elements such as header and TextNodes. Building the XML file was done using the following links: https://docs.oracle.com/javase/8/docs/technotes/guides/xml/index.html https://developers.google.com/kml/documentation/kml_tut http://www.mkyong.com/java/how-to-create-xml-file-in-java-dom/ https://stackoverflow.com/questions/23520208/how-to-create-xml-file-with-specific-structure-in-java https://stackoverflow.com/questions/1937684/java-saving-streamresult-to-a-file https://stackoverflow.com/questions/12120055/conversion-of-csv-to-xml-with-java http://dagik.org/kml_intro/E/line.html
